segments.text: My gaze wanders to the window above the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a stark contrast to the scene inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden appears so calm and perfectly manicured.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a neat path and lovely low bushes flanking it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outdoors seems so serene and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly is a beautiful, tranquil sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then my eyes return to the rising water and the oblivious woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The disorder within this room feels so wrong compared to the outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can such a tidy exterior exist alongside this indoor chaos?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost feels like two different worlds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The simple lines of the house from outside must hide so much everyday mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it hard to reconcile the two images.
segments.speaker: PAR
